text:
Door-to-door data entry for updating of National Population Registry commenced here on Monday.

Over 1,300 government school teachers have been deployed for door-to-door data collection for updating the NPR and linking it with Aadhar numbers and personal mobile numbers. The data collection will continue up to February 5.

According to an administration release, people are requested to provide their Aadhar number, along with the personal mobile number to link it with the NPR. Any information and clarifications may be sorted out through the toll free number 1077/ 8903891077/ 18004257016/ 18004251071.
title: Data update for NPR
